text: @NYGovCuomo Gov. Cuomo- I am getting more pertinent information from your briefings than POTUS . When you recognize the Healthcare workers, please don’t forget your respiratory therapists who manage those ventilators, high flow O2 systems, and are in direct contact with the Covid19 patients.
